amendment.description: To provide for the adjustment of status of certain foreign agricultural workers, to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to reform the H-2A worker program under that Act, to provide a stable, legal agricultural workforce, to extend basic legal protections and better working conditions to more workers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 375 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Craig.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 375 presented in Senate.
Cloture not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 98.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 375 that the amendment is non-germane.
Amendment SA 375 ruled non-germane by the chair.
